# isSelected

**Instance Property**

Determines whether the row is selected.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isSelected: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if selected, otherwise [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Row Selection

- **selectionHighlightStyle**: Specifies the selection highlight style.
